professional_expense_management.description: Split expenses fairly, track debts and payments, and disconnect from complicated calculations.
professional_expense_management.title: Professional Expense Management

smart_task_management.description: Create, share and track home tasks easily. Set recurring tasks and track progress of all roommates.

smooth_communication.description: Add notes, updates and messages. Keep everyone updated and perfectly coordinated.
